name: Mount Farewell
description:
Help Lux overcome the 5 stages of grief while finally climbing the mount they and their dead partner used to talk about climbing in this hard, hand crafted 2D precision platformer.



  • A big and beautiful 2D single-player platformer adventure about grief.
  • 200+ hand crafted screens to overcome on "Mount Farewell".
  • Over 100 things to collects.
  • Fluid and easy to understand controls.



This fast paced game is made for the people who like to challenge themselves. The controls are easy to understand, all you have to do to get to the top of the mountain is jump, dash, and use your bird as a grappling hook (it sounds weird, I know, that's the fun part!)
